statements: SELECT * FROM election_results;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM election_results WHERE election_year = 2020;
SELECT election_year, candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM election_results ORDER BY election_year DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY candidate_name, party_affiliation;
SELECT party_affiliation, AVG(votes_received) AS average_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY party_affiliation ORDER BY average_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM election_results WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic' ORDER BY votes_received DESC
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY candidate_name, party_affiliation
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM election_results WHERE election_year = 2020 ORDER BY candidate_name ASC
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM election_results WHERE votes_received > 10000 ORDER BY party_affiliation DESC
SELECT election_id, election_year, candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM election_results
SELECT * FROM election_results;
SELECT election_id, candidate_name, votes_received FROM election_results WHERE election_year = 2020;
SELECT district_id, district_name, winner_candidate FROM election_districts ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY candidate_name;
SELECT district_name, winner_candidate, total_votes FROM election_districts WHERE total_votes > 10000;
SELECT election_year, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY election_year
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM election_results ORDER BY votes_received DESC
SELECT district_name, winner_candidate, total_votes FROM election_districts WHERE total_votes > 100000 ORDER BY total_votes ASC
SELECT district_name, winner_candidate, total_votes FROM election_districts WHERE winner_candidate = 'John Doe'
SELECT election_year, candidate_name, votes_received FROM election_results WHERE election_year = 2020
SELECT * FROM election_results;
SELECT election_name, winning_party FROM election_results ORDER BY election_name;
SELECT district_name, state_code FROM voting_districts WHERE district_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM candidate_results ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT election_name, election_year, winning_party FROM election_results WHERE election_year = 2020;
SELECT election_name, election_year, winning_party FROM election_results;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM candidate_results WHERE votes_received > 1000;
SELECT district_name, state_code FROM voting_districts WHERE state_code = 'NY';
SELECT district_name, state_code, election_year FROM voting_districts INNER JOIN election_results ON voting_districts.election_id = election_results.election_id;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, winning_party FROM candidate_results INNER JOIN election_results ON candidate_results.election_id = election_results.election_id WHERE election_year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM ElectionResults WHERE election_year = 2020;
SELECT voter_name, precinct_id FROM VoterTurnout WHERE vote_cast = true;
SELECT party_name, founding_year FROM PoliticalParties ORDER BY founding_year DESC;
SELECT district_name, total_voters FROM ElectionDistricts WHERE total_voters > 50000;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM ElectionResults WHERE election_year = 2020 ORDER BY votes_received DESC
SELECT party_name, founding_year FROM PoliticalParties WHERE founding_year > 2000
SELECT voter_name, precinct_id FROM VoterTurnout WHERE vote_cast = TRUE ORDER BY precinct_id ASC
SELECT * FROM ElectionDistricts WHERE total_voters > 5000
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM ElectionResults WHERE election_year = 2024 ORDER BY candidate_name
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults;
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM ElectionResults WHERE election_year = 2020;
SELECT party_affiliation, COUNT(*) AS total_candidates FROM CandidateInfo GROUP BY party_affiliation;
SELECT district_name, region FROM ElectionDistricts WHERE region = 'West';
SELECT AVG(voter_turnout) AS avg_voter_turnout FROM ElectionStatistics;
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic' AND votes_received > 1000 ORDER BY election_year DESC, candidate_name ASC;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM ElectionResults GROUP BY candidate_name, party_affiliation;
SELECT ei.candidate_name, ei.party_affiliation, COUNT(vi.voter_id) AS total_voters FROM CandidateInfo ei JOIN VoterInfo vi ON ei.candidate_name = vi.voter_name GROUP BY ei.candidate_name;

SELECT ed.district_name, es.total_votes, es.voter_turnout FROM ElectionDistricts ed JOIN ElectionStatistics es ON ed.district_id = es.election_id WHERE es.voter_turnout > 0.7 ORDER BY es.total_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults WHERE election_id = (SELECT MAX(election_id) FROM ElectionResults) AND votes_received = (SELECT MAX(votes_received) FROM ElectionResults);
